lead_paragraph: The attack, which injured 15 people near the entrance to a music festival, was the fourth high-profile assault in the country in a week.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Gregor Aisch and Victor Homola from Berlin; Rukmini Callimachi from Stuttgart, Germany; Boryana Dzhambazova from Sofia, Bulgaria; and Patrick Boehler from Hong Kong.

headline.print_headline: Suicide Bomber in Germany Pledged Loyalty to ISIS, Officials Say
headline.main: Suicide Bomber in Ansbach, Germany, Pledged Loyalty to ISIS, Officials Say

snippet: The attack, which injured 15 people near the entrance to a music festival, was the fourth high-profile assault in the country in a week....
abstract: Syrian Suicide bomber professes loyalty to Islamic State before blowing himself up outside wine bar in southern Germany, wounding 15 people.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
